name: Size Matters
description:
• You play as a scientist who is shrinking every second - it's a race against time! Find all the ingredients and formulas scattered around the laboratory - which are necessary for producing the life-saving antidote. Save yourself from shrinking to death!
  • Operate equipment such as: Chemical Processor, The Reverter, Code Combiner, Antidote Producer and more!
  • But beware, your time is very precious - you need to process ingredients using lab equipment all while searching for missing components or rearranging the lab so you're able to reach stuff when you're smaller!
Gameplay
  • Search the laboratory for ingredients and formulas which aid you to produce the three key components of the antidote!
  • Every formula is tied to one of the machines in the lab. You can produce new ingredients, which may be used in other formulas or are one of the three key ingredients you need for the antidote
  • Once you collect three key ingredients, place them inside the antidote processor to produce an antidote!
  • When you shrink too small the game is over!
